basics.name: Aaron Noel De Leon
basics.label: UI Engineer
basics.summary: I'm an experienced software developer focusing on UI Engineering and Design Systems. I spent most of my career as a consultant for clients around the world; crafting delightful apps and websites using modern web technologies.

work.summary: Started Intent – a suite of tools that help users be more intentional with their digital life.
highlights: Crafted a custom, gesture-based Android app launcher using react-native.
Created browser extensions: Browser which mutes distracting website features, and Timer which provides insights and limits to time spent online.
Developed the marketing website using GatsbyJS, ReactJS, styled-components, styled-system, and GraphQL.

work.summary: Crafted Karma – a web app for sending letters of gratitude and Letter – a platform for long-form conversations.
highlights: Designed and documented the UI using Sketch, InVision, and StyleGuidist.
Developed the app using ReactJS, styled-system, and styled-components.

work.summary: Developed apps with X-Team – a remote-first consulting agency.
highlights: Made the applicant review process at least 8x more efficient by automating the company's initial vetting process.
Modernized TokenHub, an Initial Coin Offering (ICO) platform, from a jQuerybased codebase to ReactJS, Redux, and Immutable. Pushed critical fixes to Authentication, Investment, and Dashboard pages.

Developed Capture – a screencasting app that integrates with storage and issue-tracking services. Added automated build and update, audio recording, multi-screen support & cursor tracking using Electron, ReactJS, and RecordRTC.

work.summary: Crafted the branding, marketing, documentation, and console app of Phaxio – an easy-to-use fax API for developers.
highlights: Contributed 4x increase in page views by observing SEO best practices.
Developed the marketing and documentation website using Jekyll, SCSS, & JS.
Redesigned the Ruby-based console's front-end using HAML, SCSS, & JS.

work.summary: Designed and developed Vyllage – a collaborative resumé and job referral network for universities.
highlights: Designed prototypes and high-fidelity mockups using Sketch and InVision.
Lead the front-end implementation using ReactJS, SASS, Webpack, & Reflux.
Wrote unit tests for components using Jasmine.

work.summary: Contributed to the web apps made by Voyager – the digital arm of the top telecommunications company in the Philippines.
highlights: Contributed fixes and new features to SmartNet – a social network aggregating feed from users’ social accounts. Used by thousands of users.
Crafted Voyager Developer Portal – public APIs for Voyager products.
Designed Smart Places – a mobile app for location-based reminders and actions. Won Here Open Location Hackathon 2014.

volunteer.summary: Global movement of free coding clubs for young people.

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

references.name: Howard Avner
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Aaron, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
